title: SAHASAN
author: SAHASAN
content: XRP is a old altcoin. I have a question to all crypto and blockchain expert that xrp is a cryptocurreny or a token ?I want to know the opinion about the future of xrp ?

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: XRP is of course a cryptocurrency, since it has its own network and blockchain. Its future depends heavily on the future of Ripple Labs company.

But if it's Bitcoin, we'll all say that it has the future and it is the future. Quote from: Marvelman on November 21, 2023, 07:11:49 PMIts future depends heavily on the future of Ripple Labs company.Yep, this and everything they do for the project will be dependent on their actions and decisions. The news, well, they have impact at all times so if there are bad news then expect the lesser interest on it by the people and if it's positive news then it is the opposite.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: The correct answer to your questions have already been answered by some members earlier, but I'll like to add that despite SEC's charge against XRP their future still depends on the investors both small and great, because without them the coin will just lost all its value and fall back to the ground. So even after clearing all charges from the SEC they still have to convince their investors that they are worth investing in. This coin has suffered for too long but I don't think the SEC has any plan of backing off until they crush its progress totally. Ripple ought to be one of the worlds greatest altcoin with a good price, but today it's just like other coins, struggling to survive.
